content.body: Aapo Alasuutari Regarding https://github.com/Igalia/webengineshackfest/issues/48, I suggest getting in touch with TC53 if you haven't yet (even though that's not about a subset of JS, if you are working on embedded devices it's very relevant)
content.formatted_body: @aapo.alasuutari:matrix.org Regarding https://github.com/Igalia/webengineshackfest/issues/48, I suggest getting in touch with TC53 if you haven't yet (even though that's not about a subset of JS, if you are working on embedded devices it's very relevant)
